segments.text: I'm watching that boy on the stool, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks so wobbly, its legs are splayed outwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched up so high, his balance seems incredibly fragile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any slight movement could send him tumbling backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's concentrating solely on that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He doesn't even seem to notice how unstable his perch is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could really hurt him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there's a plate in his hand too, what a distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep expecting to hear a crash and a cry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him is oblivious to the immediate danger as well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's only focused on getting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels like an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stabilize that stool for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's hard to watch without wanting to intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple moment, yet fraught with peril.
segments.speaker: PAR
